briefTitle: Messaging Strategies to Reduce Breast Cancer Over-screening in Older Women
officialTitle: Messaging Strategies to Reduce Breast Cancer Over-screening in Older Women
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Support for stopping screening for a hypothetical patient in survey vignette assessed by score on a scale
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Part of an online survey panel called KnowledgePanel
* able to complete survey in English

Exclusion Criteria:

* Personal history of breast cancer
